remarks: Property deduction for power series addition.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2015.)
statement:
psrplusgpropd.b1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
psrplusgpropd.b2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` S ) ) $.
psrplusgpropd.p $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) $.
psrplusgpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( +g ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( +g ` ( I mPwSer S ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d R y $.
$d S x y $.
$d S y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ph y $.
